summary: An email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York inquiring about whether there are any other passports for Jeffrey Epstein aside from the one seized from his safe, in relation to FOIA litigation.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The email asks about whether there are any other passports for him aside from the one seized from his safe, in connection with FOIA litigation.

keyFacts: The email is dated January 3, 2022, indicating ongoing FOIA litigation related to Jeffrey Epstein years after his death.
The inquiry is about whether there are any other passports for Jeffrey Epstein aside from the one seized from his safe.
The email is from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York, showing continued government handling of Epstein-related matters.
